#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int n,m,c=1;
	bool flag=false;
	while(1){
		cin>>n>>m;
		if(n==0&&m==0)
			break;
		int A[n+5][m+5];
		string B[n+5];
		for(int i=0;i<n+5;i++)
		for(int j=0;j<m+5;j++)
			A[i][j]=0;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
			cin>>B[i];
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		for(int j=1;j<=B[i].size();j++){
			if(B[i].at(j-1)=='*'){
				A[i][j]=10;
				A[i][j+1]++;
				A[i+1][j+1]++;
				A[i+1][j]++;
				A[i+1][j-1]++;
				A[i][j-1]++;
				A[i-1][j-1]++;
				A[i-1][j]++;
				A[i-1][j+1]++;
			}
		}
		if(flag)
			cout<<endl;
		flag=true;
		cout<<"Field #"<<c<<":"<<endl;
		c++;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
			for(int j=1;j<=m;j++){
				if(A[i][j]>=10)
					cout<<"*";
				else
					cout<<A[i][j];
			}
			cout<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
